duties_responsibilities.duty: Consult with patients and interpret evaluations and test results.
Develop personalized treatment plans and administer physical therapy treatments.
Advise patients on exercise techniques, in-home treatment options, and injury prevention.
Provide educational information on promoting physical health and collaborate with other healthcare professionals.
Document patient care history and ensure compliance with regulations and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in Physical Therapy from an accredited institution.
Valid state license to practice physical therapy.
Pass the National Physical Therapist Examination (NPTE).
Completion of an American Physical Therapy Association (APTA)-accredited residency program.
